channel.title: Playing client + webclient error
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I got a problem. When I wanna play a server from a client or webclient it gives me error when I open it. It says :
Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading overloadx (or other server).
To fix this try the following (in order) :
1: Try close ALL open web browsers, windows and reloading. 2: Try clearing your web browser cache from tools->Internet options. 3: Try use a different game-world. 4: Try rebooting your computer. 5: Try select a different version of Java from the play-game menu.
Could someone help me or show me in teamviewer?

item.title: Playing client + webclient error
item.dc:creator: @ut_shady ut shady
item.description:
@ut_shady wrote:

i do have teamviewer, but im more of a forums person than coder sorry.

Read full topic

nah its for client too idk why :S do you have teamviewer then il show you. and you can fix if it possible

item.title: Playing client + webclient error
item.dc:creator: @ut_shady ut shady
item.description:
@ut_shady wrote:

This is for webclient, You have to x out of all your internet browsers, then reopen the webclient on new one. Should work.

Read full topic
